case.title: Serious relationship with a kink (cuckold) (NYC)
case.text: Looking for a serious mutually loving caring relationship where i can bring other men in our bedroom but no other women allowed (quite selfish, i know) Me: early 20s, attractive white female, intelligent, educated, great career, many different interests. You: straight/bi 27-40 year old male, at least 5'10 tall, educated. This is a serious post and not an ad for a 3way hookup To reply you MUST send your PICTURE and put "Share" in the subject line otherwise the email will be marked as spam P.S. people who did reply previously to this post and did not get a response please do not bother emailing again, there is a reason i did not reply thank you and have a nice day everyone
